name: Fordham
description:
Introduction

More of a multi-pitch abseil than a canyon, Fordham Canyon is one of those canyons you do when you've run out of options for new canyons.

Approach

Descent

This canyon is described in limited detail in Canyons Near Sydney by Rick Jamieson. Help the Australian canyoning community by contributing track notes to ropewiki.com

Exit

Red tape
